title: kolani dhOpariki
sahitya:
kolani dOpariki gobbiLLO yadukula swamikini gobbiLLO




caraNam 1



konda kodugugA gOkula gAchina 
kondaga shisuvuku gobbiLLO
tuNda kamkuni  daidiya kellanu- thala
guNdu kaNdunaki gobbiLLO



caraNam 2


pApa vidula shishu pAlumi tittula
kOpa dAnikini gobbiLLO
Ekuli kamsani idumala vettina
gOpa bAluniki gobbiLLO




caraNam 3



daNdi vaidunalu darimina danujala
guNda tagulunaku gobbiLLO
vEnti vairisaku vEnkata giripai
kondalaiyanaku gobbiLLO
